\#\# Russia

\subsection{Russian Post Offices in Turkish Empire: Corfu}

\subsubsection{1867 Corfu}
\ph[width=.70\textwidth]{../soviet-union/1146.jpg}{1146				
RUSSIA 1868 (15 May) FL from Taganrog to Corfu, franked with 1k, 2k and 3k (horizontally laid paper), tied by cds, with Constantinople transit and franked with pair of 20L on arrival in Kerkura (4 June), lettersheet strengthened and repaired, fine appearance, with Roger Calves cert.		n/a
